meanings.sent1: She felt overwhelmed by the multitasked assignments.
meanings.sent2: The multitasked student was able to juggle homework and chores effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The multitasked robot tried to cook, clean, and dance all at once!
meanings.sent4: Her brain felt like a multitasked computer, processing information from different sources simultaneously.
meanings.sent5: The multitasked worker was like a superhero, handling various tasks with ease.

meanings.definition: Capable of performing multiple tasks at the same time.
meanings.sent1: The multitasked employee impressed the boss with their efficiency.
meanings.sent2: She was a multitasked individual who could work on several projects concurrently.
meanings.sent3: The multitasked chef cooked, baked, and grilled all at once in the busy kitchen.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like a multitasked machine, managing different tasks effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The multitasked juggler amazed the audience by juggling balls, rings, and clubs simultaneously.
